teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Woman’s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur – even $25 – will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Woman’s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Woman’s Nation™ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one another in a spirit of brotherhood.

Use this to recruite friends. http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Location: HeartMath Denmark
Street: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 floor , 1202 Copenhagen K

More Info:: Facebook-group: Kiva Denmark  link: http://www.facebook.com/groups/55972417726/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Gruppen her er for alle i Danmark, der støtter denne fantastiske ide om at hjælpe verden ét skridt af gangen.

Vil du hjælpe: Inviter venner - fortæl om Kiva 
http://www.kiva.org/invitedto/denmark/by/freetrial

Kiva Denmark holder møder om hvad vi kan gøre for at udbrede kendskabet til denne unikke måde at hjælpe på. Kontakt: Kristine.flagstad@uni-c.dk hvis du har nogen ideer eller skriv en meddelelse her til gruppen.

Næste møde holdes hos: HeartMath Danmark
Adresse: Gammel Strand 34 . 4 sal, 1202 Copenhagen K
Dato: Ikke fastlagt pt. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~

teams.description: The University of Washington (or UDub) is a large public university in Seattle, Washington committed to making a difference.

teams.name: Holly's Ride 55 Supporters
teams.loan_because: People like you can join this team, then make a loan to a global friend pursuing their dream and building their life!
teams.description:
A team of people that want to help others by lending money to global entrepreneurs by donating through Holly's Ride 55 lending team. The team supports the 555 mile bicycle trip down the East coast of Florida, USA that Holly will be taking in May 2010 to celebrate her 55th birthday and raise money for 5 worthy causes, including Kiva.org.

Join the team, then make a loan and choose the team to lend on behalf of. The team goal is $1,111 of loans during May, 2010! Please join and donate now - Thanks!

We believe in amendment of life, the forgiveness of sin, and life everlasting.  All are welcome to find a spiritual home in the Episcopal Church.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

1. NWTF can be TRUSTED (see their financial reports pp. 20-21 at their 2010 ANNUAL REPORT. http://nwtf.ph/reports/annual/AR2010.pdf
2. NWTF has more than 25 years of micro-finance EXPERIENCE.
3. NWTF's clients have shown consistent repayment PERFORMANCE (see p.19 of the 2010 ANNUAL REPORT. http://nwtf.ph/reports/annual/AR2010.pdf
teams.description:
VISIT & EXPLORE : www.nwtf.ph
  NWTF has struck me as an organization that has the well-being of its member clients at the heart of all its activities. It is a pioneer in social performance management, and uses the progress out of poverty index (developed by Grameen) to measure a clients' poverty level following each loan cycle." Joanne, Kiva Fellow (volunteer)

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Colbert Nation
teams.loan_because: I am helping my fellow wealthy American friends lighten their swollen pockets to help the rest of the world prosper.
teams.description: Stephen Colbert is the host and executive producer of the Emmy-nominated series on Comedy Central, "The Colbert Report." Touted by the New York Times as "one of the best television shows of the year" and praised as "a must-watch show" by Entertainment Weekly, "The Colbert Report" has garnered ratings and critical success as one of the top shows on television.

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Kiva Ravenna
teams.loan_because: Crediamo nel microcredito
teams.description: Kiva Ravenna è nata nel Novembre 2008 con lo scopo di promuovere il sistema di microcredito sviluppato da KIVA.ORG e per unire tutti coloro che a Ravenna e dintorni sono sostenitori del progetto Kiva

teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.description: Yahoo! employees, alumni and friends. Loan a little, but make a huge difference.

teams.name: India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Kiva Jews
teams.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - making the world a better place.
teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Bolder Browns

teams.name: Rally Software

Rally Software was founded in 2002 in Boulder CO. We are now a growing global company. Our communities are growing. We invite anyone from any of our communities to join our team, including Rally Software employees, families, friends, customers, people in the Agile Community.

teams.name: World Christianity & Justice - Hope College
teams.loan_because: together, we wish to live lives of Christian faithfulness to God's command of justice. Recognizing God's call to justice (Micah 6:8) we are committed to helping others in need. We believe that God calls us to care for people in ways that recognize their dignity and efforts to provide for others.
teams.description: We are a group of students and faculty who seek to alleviate poverty by sharing a portion of what God has graciously entrusted to us. We loan funds in an effort to restore the dignity of others. Christ has blessed us and called us to share in the work of the kingdom of God. This is a concrete way in which we express the love of Christ to others.

The political status of Québec is a province within the country of Canada (although a portion of the population would prefer Québec to become sovereign in the future).  The Parliament of Canada has recognized the Québécois as a nation. The largest city in Québec is Montréal, and the capital is also called Québec (Quebec City). teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Team Permaculture
teams.loan_because: We want to reinvest our surpluses in eco-social regeneration!
teams.description: Mutually supportive functionally interconnected mycelial network of permaculture actionists.

teams.name: Maldives
teams.loan_because: We all have a common stake in one another.

teams.name: Harvard Business School Kiva Team
teams.loan_because: We loan to support entrepreneurs all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Better Life Bags
teams.loan_because:
Better Life Bags gives 10% of every transaction to an entreprenuer overseas and sends a picture of that person to the customer who ordered an item from our shop (http://betterlifebags.etsy.com).  

We believe that a better world is possible and we want to begin by doing our part to alleviate poverty.

"So whatever you wish that others would do to you do also to them for this is the law and the prophets."
-Jesus

"Be the change you want to see in the world."
-Gandhi
teams.description:
Our team consists of people who have bought a bag from Better Life Bags.  They have seen the difference one loan can make and decided to join our team!  We love purses and people!

Blog: www.betterlifebags.com

teams.name: KivaFriends - Agriculture Loans
teams.loan_because: we want to reduce world hunger.  This includes loans for farming, livestock, poultry, and the like.
teams.description: Our group makes loans to people that create more food for those in the world.  Many of these entrepreneurs are farmers that often request loans to help them with their crops.  Many times these loans are for a longer repayment period.

teams.name: Asians
teams.loan_because: it helps families around the world
teams.description: Team #1

teams.name: New York University
teams.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
teams.description: Although we are students and do not have much to give, we gladly give to our brothers and sisters across the globe whatever we can come up with. *Note: We are a group of students who attend NYU; the university is NOT affiliated with this program in any form or function*

teams.name: Sichuan Relief
teams.loan_because: We are similarly helping communities in Sichuan

teams.name: NYU & Friends - Social Lender's Circle
teams.loan_because: We understand that charity works best when combined with sustainability. We hope that microfinancing proves to be an enduring way to improve the condition of people all over the world.
teams.description: Hello, world. Our team was formed to demonstrate the presence of NYU alumni, students, faculty, staff, and their awesome friends within the Kiva lending community. We are a global collection of lenders and concerned individuals who hope to make a difference in the lives and societies of less advantaged people. The group is open, and people are welcome to join, as desired.

teams.name: KPMG
teams.loan_because: Employees of KPMG want to make a difference in the world
teams.description: KPMG operates as an international network of member firms offering audit, tax and advisory services. We work closely with our clients, helping them to mitigate risks and grasp opportunities.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Naramata School InStill Life Project Group
teams.loan_because: We loan because we can.
teams.description: We are students of Naramata School.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Carbonites and Friends
teams.loan_because: Because we all have some kind of bond.. With that bond, we lend together to help those that weren't as fortunate to make the long lasting relationships that we will always have!
teams.description: Our team is a web of hometown friends and their friends.. A group of people with all different ambitions and walks of life but always have a place in their heart for the Dale.

teams.name: Cliff & Leona
teams.loan_because: of Luann
teams.description: We are cousins in a family

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: The Barefoot Investor
teams.loan_because: We believe everyone can tread their own path.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of microloans to make a sustainable positive impact on the lives of entrepreneurs in the developing world.
teams.description: We share at least two things in common: (1) We believe in the power of Kiva to alleviate poverty and (2) we live in or have a connection to the great city of Madison, Wisconsin, USA

teams.name: Student Microfinance & Development Initiative (SMDI)
teams.loan_because: We believe microfinance is an effective tool to help reducing poverty.
teams.description: “The Student Microfinance Development Initiative (SMDI) is an international student organisation. It provides academic research on microfinance and innovative development solutions and related services to MFIs, social enterprises and other institutions. It aims to add value to the work of these entities by giving students the chance to use their skills and commitment to the cause.”

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Yale University
teams.loan_because: Because we can...
teams.description: Help through education...

teams.name: Hustlers
teams.loan_because: Everyone should have a Hustler....
teams.description: Completely lost, but making good time.......

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Experian Employees
teams.loan_because: As a global company, we are committed to contributing to the economic success of developing nations and their hard working entrepreneurs!
teams.description: Membership is limited to active Experian Employees. If you have any questions about the team contact Trevor Speirs.
